h6101.definition: a primitive root; to lean idly, i.e. to be indolent or slack; be slothful.

h6105.definition: a primitive root; also denominatively (from {{h6106}}); to bind fast, i.e. close (the eyes); intransitively, to be (causatively, make) powerful or numerous; to crunch the bones; break the bones, close, be great, be increased, be (wax) mighty(-ier), be more, shut, be(-come, make) strong(-er).

h6106.definition: from {{h6105}}; a bone (as strong); by extension, the body; figuratively, the substance, i.e. (as pron.) selfsame; body, bone, × life, (self-) same, strength, × very.

h6107.definition: the same as {{h6106}}; bone; Etsem, a place in Palestine; Azem, Ezem.

h6108.definition: from {{h6105}}; power; hence, body; might, strong, substance.

h6109.definition: feminine of {{h6108}}; powerfulness; by extension, numerousness; abundance, strength.

h6110.definition: feminine of {{h6099}}; a bulwark, i.e. (figuratively) argument; strong.

h6111.definition: or עַצְמֹן; from {{h6107}}; bone-like; Atsmon, a place near Palestine; Azmon.

h6112.definition: from an unused root meaning to be sharp or strong; a spear; Eznite (from the margin).

h6113.definition: a primitive root; to inclose; by analogy, to hold back; also to maintain, rule, assemble; × be able, close up, detain, fast, keep (self close, still), prevail, recover, refrain, × reign, restrain, retain, shut (up), slack, stay, stop, withhold (self).

h6115.definition: from {{h6113}}; closure; also constraint; × barren, oppression, × prison.

h6116.definition: or עֲצֶרֶת; from {{h6113}}; an assembly, especially on a festival or holiday; (solemn) assembly (meeting).

h6117.definition: a primitive root; properly, to swell out or up; used only as denominative from {{h6119}},; to seize by the heel; figuratively, to circumvent (as if tripping up the heels); also to restrain (as if holding by the heel); take by the heel, stay, supplant, × utterly.

h6118.definition: from {{h6117}} in the sense of {{h6119}}; a heel, i.e. (figuratively) the last of anything (used adverbially, for ever); also result, i.e. compensation; and so (adverb with preposition or relatively) on account of; × because, by, end, for, if, reward.

h6119.definition: or (feminine) עִקְּבָה; from {{h6117}}; a heel (as protuberant); hence, a track; figuratively, the rear (of an army); heel, (horse-) hoof, last, lier in wait (by mistake for {{h6120}}), (foot-) step.

h6120.definition: from {{h6117}} in its denominative sense; a lier in wait; heel (by mistake for {{h6119}}).

h6121.definition: from {{h6117}}; in the original sense, a knoll (as swelling up); in the denominative sense; (transitive) fraudulent or (intransitive) tracked; crooked, deceitful, polluted.

h6122.definition: feminine of an unused form from {{h6117}} meaning a trick; trickery; subtilty.

h6123.definition: a primitive root; to tie with thongs; bind.

h6126.definition: from {{h6117}}; insidious; Akkub, the name of five Israelites; Akkub.

h6127.definition: a primitive root; to wrest; wrong.

h6130.definition: from an unused root meaning to twist; tortuous; Akan, an Idummaean; Akan. Compare {{h3292}}.

h6131.definition: a primitive root; to pluck up (especially by the roots); specifically, to hamstring; figuratively, to exterminate; dig down, hough, pluck up, root up.

h6132.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6131}}; pluck up by the roots.

h6133.definition: from {{h6131}}; figuratively, a transplanted person, i.e. naturalized citizen; stock.

h6134.definition: the same as {{h6133}}; Eker, an Israelite; Eker.

h6135.definition: from {{h6131}}; sterile (as if extirpated in the generative organs); (× male or female) barren (woman).

h6137.definition: of uncertain derivation; a scorpion; figuratively, a scourge or knotted whip; scorpion.

h6138.definition: from {{h6131}}; eradication; Ekron, a place in Palestine; Ekron.

h6139.definition: or עֶקְרֹנִי; patrial from {{h6138}}; an Ekronite or inhabitant of Ekron; Ekronite.

h6140.definition: a primitive root; to knot or distort; figuratively, to pervert (act or declare perverse); make crooked, (prove, that is) perverse(-rt).

h6141.definition: from {{h6140}}; distorted; hence, false; crooked, froward, perverse.

h6142.definition: the same as {{h6141}}; perverse; Ikkesh, an Israelite; Ikkesh.

h6144.definition: the same as {{h5892}}; a city; Ar, a place in Moab; Ar.

h6145.definition: from {{h5782}}; a foe (as watchful for mischief); enemy.

h6147.definition: from {{h5782}}; watchful; Er, the name of two Israelites; Er.

h6148.definition: a primitive root; to braid, i.e. intermix; technically, to traffic (as if by barter); also or give to be security (as a kind of exchange); engage, (inter-) meddle (with), mingle (self), mortgage, occupy, give pledges, be(-come, put in) surety, undertake.

h6149.definition: a primitive root (rather identical with {{h6148}} through the idea of close association); to be agreeable; be pleasant(-ing), take pleasure in, be sweet.

h6150.definition: a primitive root (rather identical with {{h6148}} through the idea of covering with a texture); to grow dusky at sundown; be darkened, (toward) evening.

h6151.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6148}}; to commingle; mingle (self), mix.

h6152.definition: or עֲרַב; from {{h6150}} in the figurative sense of sterility; Arab (i.e. Arabia), a country East of Palestine; Arabia.

h6153.definition: from {{h6150}}; dusk; day, even(-ing, tide), night.

h6154.definition: or עֶרֶב; (1 Kings 10:15), (with the article prefix), from {{h6148}}; the web (or transverse threads of cloth); also a mixture, (or mongrel race); Arabia, mingled people, mixed (multitude), woof.

h6155.definition: from {{h6148}}; a willow (from the use of osiers as wattles); willow.

h6157.definition: from {{h6148}}; a mosquito (from its swarming); divers sorts of flies, swarm.

h6158.definition: or עוֹרֵב; from {{h6150}}; a raven (from its dusky hue); raven.

h6159.definition: or עוֹרֵב; the same as {{h6158}}; Oreb, the name of a Midianite and of the cliff near the Jordan; Oreb.

h6160.definition: from {{h6150}} (in the sense of sterility); a desert; especially (with the article prefix) the (generally) sterile valley of the Jordan and its continuation to the Red Sea; Arabah, champaign, desert, evening, heaven, plain, wilderness. See also {{h1026}}.

h6161.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h6048}} in the sense of a bargain or exchange; something given as security, i.e. (literally) a token (of safety) or (metaphorically) a bondsman; pledge, surety.

h6162.definition: from {{h6148}} (in the sense of exchange); a pawn (given as security); pledge.

h6163.definition: or עַרְבִי; patrial from {{h6152}}; an Arabian or inhabitant of Arab (i.e. Arabia); Arabian.

h6164.definition: patrial from {{h1026}}; an Arbathite or inhabitant of (Beth-) Arabah; Arbahite.

h6165.definition: a primitive root; to long for; cry, pant.

h6166.definition: from an unused root meaning to sequester itself; fugitive; Arad, the name of a place near Palestine, also of a Canaanite and an Israelite; Arad.

h6167.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6171}}; an onager; wild ass.

h6168.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively, make) bare; hence, to empty, pour out, demolish; leave destitute, discover, empty, make naked, pour (out), rase, spread self, uncover.

h6169.definition: feminine from {{h6168}}; a naked (i.e. level) plot; paper reed.

h6170.definition: or עֲרֻגָה; feminine passive participle of {{h6165}}; something piled up (as if (figuratively) raised by mental aspiration), i.e. a paterre; bed, furrow.

h6171.definition: from the same as {{h6166}}; an onager (from his lonesome habits); wild ass.

h6172.definition: from {{h6168}}; nudity, literally (especially the pudenda) or figuratively (disgrace, blemish); nakedness, shame, unclean(-ness).

h6173.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h6172}}; nakedness, i.e. (figuratively) impoverishment; dishonor.

h6174.definition: or עָרֹם; from {{h6191}} (in its original sense); nude, either partially or totally; naked.

h6175.definition: passive participle of {{h6191}}; cunning (usually in a bad sense); crafty, prudent, subtil.

h6176.definition: or עַרְעָר; from {{h6209}} reduplicated; a juniper (from its nudity of situation); health.

h6177.definition: or עֲרֹעֵר; or עַרְעוֹר; the same as {{h6176}}; nudity of situation; Aroër, the name of three places in or near Palestine; Aroer.

h6178.definition: passive participle of {{h6206}}; feared, i.e. (concretely) a horrible place or chasm; cliffs.

h6179.definition: from {{h5782}}; watchful; Eri, an Israelite; Eri.

h6180.definition: patronymically of {{h6179}}; an Erite (collectively) or descendants of Eri; Erites.

h6182.definition: from an unused root meaning to comminute; meal; dough.

h6183.definition: from {{h6201}}; the sky (as drooping at the horizon); heaven.

h6184.definition: from {{h6206}}; fearful, i.e. powerful or tyrannical; mighty, oppressor, in great power, strong, terrible, violent.

h6185.definition: from {{h6209}}; bare, i.e. destitute (of children); childless.

h6186.definition: a primitive root; to set in a row, i.e. arrange, put in order (in a very wide variety of applications); put (set) (the battle, self) in array, compare, direct, equal, esteem, estimate, expert (in war), furnish, handle, join (battle), ordain, (lay, put, reckon up, set) (in) order, prepare, tax, value.

h6187.definition: from {{h6186}}; a pile, equipment, estimate; equal, estimation, (things that are set in) order, price, proportion, × set at, suit, taxation, × valuest.

h6188.definition: a primitive root; properly, to strip; but used as denominative from {{h6189}}; to expose or remove the prepuce, whether literal (to go naked) or figurative (to refrain from using); count uncircumcised, foreskin to be uncovered.

h6189.definition: from {{h6188}}; properly, exposed, i.e. projecting loose (as to the prepuce); used only technically, uncircumcised (i.e. still having the prepuce uncurtailed); uncircumcised (person).

h6190.definition: feminine of {{h6189}}; the prepuce; foreskin,   uncircumcised.

h6191.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be (or make) bare; but used only in the derivative sense (through the idea perhaps of smoothness) to be cunning (usually in a bad sense); × very, beware, take crafty (counsel), be prudent, deal subtilly.

h6192.definition: a primitive root; to pile up; gather together.

h6194.definition: (Jeremiah 50:26) or (feminine) עֲרֵמָה; from {{h6192}}; a heap; specifically, a sheaf; heap (of corn), sheaf.

h6195.definition: feminine of {{h6193}}; trickery; or (in a good sense) discretion; guile, prudence, subtilty, wilily, wisdom.

h6196.definition: probably from {{h6191}}; the plane tree (from its smooth and shed bark); chestnut tree.

h6197.definition: probably from {{h5782}}; watchful; Eran, an Israelite; Eran.

h6198.definition: patronymically from {{h6197}}; an Eranite or descendant (collectively) of Eran; Eranites.

h6199.definition: from {{h6209}}; naked, i.e. (figuratively) poor; destitute. See also {{h6176}}.

h6200.definition: patronymically from {{h6177}}; an Aroerite or inhabitant of Aroer; Aroerite.
